release.change: Update to Android 14
UI customizations are now also available on Android 5+ (with restrictions for some versions)
Prevent reminders being added twice by accidental double-clicks on "Add" button
Settings: Option to reset "Don't show again" choices
Update battery optimization recommendations
New setting: Customize sizes of elements in the "Add reminder" dialog (see Settings -> User Interface)
New setting: Close keyboard when using the clock
The "Add reminder" dialog now also exits completely on Android 12+ when navigating back (as on previous Android versions)
Donations: support the development of SimpleReminder!
New setting: Which time to display in notifications
Long-press on Quick Settings Tile now leads to reminders list
On device startup and when starting the app, notifications for already shown due reminders are recreated silently.
Already notified nagging reminders now keep nagging after reboot and missed occurrences are skipped (instead of being shown all at once).

After startup of the device, reminders are loaded and scheduled already before logging in (can be useful as it otherwise can take several minutes before reminders are shown). Might not be available on all devices.
After the app had been force-closed (for whichever reason), reminders now continue to be shown after having opened the app once.
Updated to Android 13
Fix Quick Settings Tile on newer Android versions
Notification channel importance is now "urgent", which increases reliability of notifications being shown in time.
Empty sections are not shown anymore in the reminders list.
Automatic dark theme on Android 10+ (when dark theme is enabled in system settings)
The date for a reminder can now be chosen with +/- buttons or with a calendar widget.
The duration until a reminder is due is now shown more precisely.
New: Nagging reminders
When editing a scheduled reminder, the selected time is now set to the due date (and not to the current time as for due or done reminders).
Reminders can now also be edited with a single click in the reminders list.
Added help page
Quick Settings tile to add reminder (on Android 7.0+)
Launcher shortcuts to add reminder / view reminders list on the respective other launcher icon (on Android 7.1+)
Some UI and navigation improvements
Reminders will now be shown in Do Not Disturb mode when in the system settings the "Reminders" category has been allowed for interruption.
Use clock widget instead of spinner for choosing time (only applies to Android 5.0+).
Fixed app not starting on Android 5.1 and below.
On Android 8+ replaced notification settings for sound and priority (which did not have any effect) with a link to the notification channel settings.
Fixed: When scheduled reminders were marked as done or were deleted, they would still be shown at the due time (deleted reminders were attempted to be shown which led to a crash).
Now ask to disable battery optimization on launch as this is essential to the working of SimpleReminder.
Reminders can now be rescheduled by clicking on the notification or selecting a reminder in the list.
First F-Droid release!
